a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Net enrollment rate, boys vs. girls in pre-primary education, 2021
The net enrollment rate in pre-primary education for boys versus girls. This is calculated as the total number of male
or female students in the theoretical age group for pre-primary education who are enrolled, as a percentage of the
total male or female population of that age group.
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics
